Summary: 8 or 9 objects hovering high south of Deming during day.
divs: Sighting Detailsi am a correctional officer and had several inmates cutting weeds on the mediums on pine street Deming new Mexico, while i was looking at an area that i thought needed attention i noticed there was a communications tower as i looked up the tower from my vehicle a sharp bright reflection caught my eye as i looked south high in the sky i saw approx 8 objects just hovering i could barely see them they were so high i first thought they were a flock of birds but the objects were way too high i then thought they were jets but jets don't hover at that altitude , i then proceeded to to grab my binoculars and looked again i had trouble locating the objects but did locate the objects again i saw what looked like triangle shaped with a dark spot very fussy due to the distance, the objects seemed to move from left to right then disappear then reappear the objects were real high and with the supervising of inmates i lost sight.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Deming
There were no other sightings in Deming on or around September 23rd 2009
